name: Game Master's Toolkit 5e
description:
Game Master’s Toolkit 5e allows GMs to generate random content for their tabletop roleplaying games! Designed for 5th edition DnD, but highly compatible with other gamimg systems.

Using this app, you can:
- Create NPCs and cities to bring your world to life.
- Generate random events, quests, villains, and traps to add danger and adventure to your game.
- Generate random magic items, such as weapons, armor, potions, and scrolls.
- Use the Quick Generator to create names, taverns, shops, rumors, and more!
- Save all your favorite randomly generated content for later use.

All with the click of a button!

Game Master’s Toolkit 5e also includes a number of other tools to help you run your game.
- Use the Party Cheat Sheet to track your players’ damage and other important stats.
- Incorporate puzzles and minigames to challenge and entertain your players.
- Includes a simple dice simulator for easy rolling.

Upgrade to the premium version for even more control over the items you generate! With the full version, you can:
- Edit and add notes to your saved items.
- Edit and add notes to items as you generate them.
- Add, remove, and rearrange city elements to make it truly your own.
- Add your own homebrew puzzles and minigames for later reference.
- Export your saved items to Google Drive, Dropbox, email, notes, iMessage, social media, and whatever other apps you have on your phone.

This app also includes a built-in library of over 100 sounds and songs for you to incorporate into your game. Browse different song categories including Combat, In a Dungeon, In the City, and more! The music plays in the background, allowing you to use other apps or lock your screen without interrupting the song. Create a list of your favorite songs for easy reference.

All completely offline! No ads, no signups, no hassle. Simple and easy to use.
